Posts.Content: Jul 14, 2015 02:04AM Lillp07 wrote: Thanks for your reply. The surgeon said it needs time to heal. I have silverdyne dressings on which help with healing but I worry it will get deeper. The surgeon doesn't seem really worried but I am.
Posts.Title: I'm not healing mastectomy Lillp07 Lillp07

Posts.Content: Lillp07 wrote: I had a double mastectomy with tissue expanded 5 weeks ago and have a deep open wound still. I'm so down and upset about it. I had some superficial Nerosis on one side and that was removed one week ago. I've been left with a wound that's quite deep and needing dressing twice per week. I can't have any fills until this settles. Ive had a hard time with chemo and then very bad fluid build up after mastectomy. I would love any suggestions on healing. I'm really sad at the moment. Thank you. Posts.Content: Lillp07 wrote: I have been diagnosed with IDC and will need chemo, radiation and hormone therapy. We haven't told our daughters 7 and 11 as yet because I have an appointment on Tuesday with surgon to find out my plan for treatments. They know I had the lumpectomy but thats all. A Bunch of mums at school have been asking me if anything is wrong with me and have been talking behind my back. I want to tell people but not ready. Posts.Content: Lillp07 wrote: Has anyone had Esophageal Thrush during chemo? I have it and it's so awful. I have started medication for it but it hasn't kicked in as yet. I'm having trouble eating and drinking, I feel neasaous. My weight is dropping super fast. I spoke to oncologist this morning. He said to keep on medicationand see how it goes and may need to delay next treatment. I have excellent oral hygiene and just don't know how I got it Dx 11/12/2014, IDC, Right, 2cm, Stage IIA, Grade 1, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 11/27/2014 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel Chemotherapy 1/5/2015 CEF Surgery 6/10/2015 Lymph node removal: Left; Mastectomy: Left, Right; Reconstruction (left): Tissue expander placement; Reconstruction (right): Tissue expander placement Surgery 1/20/2016 Prophylactic ovary removal Log in to post a reply
